ShortDescription.Value: Enables vehicle clipping while ensuring AI still responds to traffic lights, pedestrians, and trains. Obliterate all in-game traffic issues with ease.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Collision Be Gone (Beta)
Disables vehicle-to-vehicle collision avoidance. Vehicles will drive through each other instead of waiting in traffic queues.
## Features - Vehicles ignore other cars and bicycles - Vehicles ignore pedestrians - Smooth acceleration when passing through obstacles
## Still Respected - Traffic signals (red lights) - Speed limits - Emergency vehicles (police, fire, ambulance) - Trains at railroad crossings - Parking scenarios
## Requirements - **Disable Accidents** mod is required to prevent chain collisions caused by vehicle overlapping
## Settings - Can be enabled/disabled in the game options menu
Inspired by the original Collision Be Gone mod for Cities: Skylines 1.

# Collision Be Gone (测试版)
禁用车辆之间的碰撞避让。车辆将直接穿过彼此，而不是在交通队列中等待。
## 功能特性 - 车辆忽略其他汽车和自行车 - 车辆忽略行人 - 穿过障碍物时平滑加速
## 仍然遵守 - 交通信号（红灯） - 速度限制 - 紧急车辆（警车、消防车、救护车） - 铁路道口的火车 - 停车场景
## 前置要求 - 需要安装 **Disable Accidents** 模组，以防止车辆重叠导致的连环车祸
## 设置 - 可在游戏选项菜单中启用/禁用
灵感来源于城市：天际线1的 Collision Be Gone 模组。
